title: I was banned and i dont know why
body: I was in a normal draft game practicing Camille. It wasn't my best game but we ended up winning thanks to teammates. After the victory symbol it said I was banned and took me to my login. Now I'm permabanned and I don't know why. I didn't type much and I'm not toxic by any means. I also never received warnings(afk warnings, chat restrictions, two day bans, etc.) it went straight to permaban. I am deployed to Afghanistan for the military so I don't know if its because of my location change or is it something I did that I'm unaware of. I put so much money into this account so I tried my best to avoid this. I never typed toxicity, inted,or trolled, unless I was in a 5 man with friends. I just want my account back its all I have out here or just a reason why I was banned in the first place for closure.

replies.body: Hey there, fear not!  This was not a behavioral suspension.  I took a look, and it seems that your account was locked as a safety precaution due to suspicious activity.  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help you with this directly!  Sorry for the concern!
Also sir how long does the recovery process take on average just curious?
ty so much I was scared man. if it was for security I'm happy
